short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Tools99 is a bookmarklet toolkit that includes useful scripts and websites.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Tools99 is a bookmarklet toolkit that includes useful scripts and websites. You can easily add/edit scripts that'll be injected into the page, or open your favorite sites. All of the scripts and urls can be imported from local file for custom or remote url for central control. All of the information is saved in local database.
